Package com.rockhoppertech.music.chord

Chord classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chord
    Models a more or less simultineity that can be created and modified using the concepts (e.g. inversion, drop voicing etc.) of a Chord.
    ChordComparator  
    ChordFactory
    GoF Factory design pattern for chords.
    ChordProgression
    A sequence of chords.
    ChordProgressionParser  
    ChordVoicing  
    RomanChordParser
    Parse chord strings specified by Weber's roman numeral conventions.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownChordException
    If you ask the ChordFactory for a chord that it doesn't grok.

Package com.rockhoppertech.music.chord Description

Chord classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gene De Lisa
